Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to traffic-control signal photo violation-monitoring devices at certain intersections in the county of Westchester
Summary: Authorizes additional traffic-control signal photo violation-monitoring devices at no more than one intersection located on the Saw Mill River parkway within the village of Pleasantville, county of Westchester, upon approval from the state department of transportation.
LawCode: Amd ยง1111-g, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the operation of traffic-control signal photo violation-monitoring devices in certain intersections in the county of Westchester
